snippet.title: OLD FOOTAGE- Global Conflagration 2V2 session
snippet.description:
Global Conflagration is a Real Time Strategy game set in a near future war-torn Europe. Defeat your opponent by taking control of the battlefield's key resource points and destroy your enemy units and bases.
Footage of our 2v2 session testing new mechanics such such as resource bounty, all players healthbar, team resource sharing, notifications and much more.
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/908770/Global_Conflagration/
Discord https://discord.com/invite/GE2csnb
IndieDB: https://www.indiedb.com/games/global-conflagration
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCsqcEnrIiaSvCOpKjyFdY-w
Twitter: https://twitter.com/GConflagration
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/GlobalConflagration/
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/GlobalConflagration/
